Dashboard Theme : Modern Dark
info:
# Modern Dark Theme for node-red-dashboard

Inspired by Victor Lucachi with his [Node Red Dashboard Concept](https://dribbble.com/shots/10356530-Node-Red-Dashboard-Concept) on Dribbble. Thank you for your work.

## Customize

1. Go on dashboard customisation tab (At the right of Debug Console).
2. Select the style `Dark`.
3. Pick the color you want. Example `#66B5F8`

## Buttons

Use `2x2` size for buttons with icon and text on the screenshot

info:
- FS progresses along at a fixed path
- FS communication is "one-way", so to speak
- Teams can ping it down as it grows
- If you get to it before it progresses to second window, 
  you get damage prevention bonus
